channel.title: How do you make a Custom home area
channel.description: I wan't too make a custom home area for my allstar v2 based source, or I want too atleast change where you start when you first log in.

item.title: How do you make a Custom home area
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Just move all you’re objects and change the spawning location of where you spawn when you log in.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a Custom home area

item.title: How do you make a Custom home area
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:8, topic:275395”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=363809.msg2762827#msg2762827 date=1240631899]

uhm, player.class, clickingmost(for teleports)

Allstar, not Delta.

Also, player class, not player.class.
[/quote]
i said player.class -.-[/quote]

Yeah… It’s the player class, not player.class.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a Custom home area
